gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.enchanting: Place enough bookshelves in a square around the infuser on up to four layers. And don't forget to fill in your corners!
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.unknown_en: This enchantment is too powerful for an infuser with such little enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.low_power: Further increasing the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
